17a

Another Introduction to Tiqqunei ha-ZoharAnother Introduction1 to Tiqqunei ha-Zohar
for Rosh Ḥodesh Elul, Day 12

Gen. 1:1

{Gen. 1:1}In the beginning, ELQYM created . . . etc.

It is written: {Dan. 12:3}The wise shall radiate∞‹∞yazhiru›,
like the radiance∞ ‹∞zohar›of the firmament . . . etc.

Dan. 12:3

∞yazhiru

∞zohar

These are Rabbi Shimon ben Yoḥai and his companions:
Rabbi El’azar his son,
and Rabbi Abba,
and Rabbi Yosse, and Rabbi Ḥiya, and Rabbi Yitzḥaq,
and the rest of the companions,
who radiate radiance3 [Var. who are radiating] above,
. . . like the radiance of the firmament.

What is meant by ‘like the radiance’?
But when they made this composition,
it was agreed to on High,
and they called it The Book of Radiance.∞‹∞Sepher ha-Zohar›.4

∞Sepher ha-Zohar

{ibid.} . . . and those who bring the many to righteousness – through it,
may there be many!

ibid.

{ibid.}. . . like the stars forever – that their light never be darkened,
for ever and ever and ever.

ibid.

At that time,
when this composition5 was composed,
permission was granted to Elijah to acquiesce with them in it,
and to all the Masters of the Academy above and below,
and all the forces of the higher angels, and higher souls,
to be with them in agreement and friendship as one.6

7Elijah8 began9 and he said:
Master of the Worlds!
For You10 are He that is One11
– but12 not in number.13

You are High above all the high ones,
hidden, beyond all that is hidden,
no thought apprehends You at all.14

You are He that has produced ten ‘constructs’15
– and we call them ‘the ten sephirot ’ i 16 –
with which to direct17 hidden worlds18 that are not revealed,
and worlds that are revealed.
And in them You are concealed [Var. it is concealed],
from humans.

And You are He that binds them,
and unites them,
and, because You are within them,
anyone who separates one from its companion, of these ten,
is considered as though he had caused separation in You.

And these ten sephirot,
they are going according to their order:
one long, and one short, and one intermediate.19

And You are He that directs them,
and there is none who direct You,
– not above, and not below,
and not from any side.

Garments, have You fixed20 for them,
from which fly-forth21 souls for [Var. of] human beings.22
And many bodies You have fixed for them,
– which are called ‘body’,23
relative to the ‘garments’24 which cover them.

And they are called in this arrangement:25
Ḥesed – right arm,
Gevurah – left arm,
Tipheret – body,
Netzaḥ and Hod – two thighs,
and Yesod – end26 of the body,27
– sign of the holy covenant.
Malkhut – ‘mouth’28 – we call it ‘Oral Torah’.29

The brain30 is Ḥokhmah,
it is inner thought.
Binah is the heart,
and with it the heart understands.31
And upon these two it is written:
{Deut. 29:28}The hidden things are for Y”Y our God. . . .

Deut. 29:28

Higher Keter,
it is the ‘crown of sovereignty’,32
and upon it is stated: {Is. 46:10}He tells the end from the beginning . . .
And it is ‘the skull33 of phylacteries’34
[Var. ‘the skull that does not lay phylacteries’ ii].35
Inside it is YOD QE VAV QE‹45›,36
which is ‘the way of emanation’.37

Is. 46:10

45

It is the watering of the tree,
with its arms and its branches, [Var. and its faces]
like water, which irrigates a tree,
and it grows through that watering.

Master of the worlds!
You are ‘the Cause of causes’,38
the Reason of reasons,39
Who waters the tree40 – with that fountain!

And that fountain is like a soul to the body,
which is the body’s life-force.
And yet41 of You,
there is no imagining, and there is no likeness,
of anything that is inside or out.

And You created heaven and earth,
and You produced from them the sun and the moon,
and stars and constellations.42
And on the earth: trees, and grasses,
and the Garden of Eden,
[and herbs] and beasts, and birds, and fish,
and people,
so that higher ones would be recognized through them,
and how higher and lower ones are directed through them,
and how they are recognized from higher and lower43
– and there is none that knows of You at all.

And outside of You, there is no uniqueness44 [Var. unity]
among the higher and the lower,
and You are known as ‘Lord over All’.

17b

And all the sephirot,
each one has its own name,45
and with them, angels are called.46
But You have no specific Name,47
for You are He that fills all Names,
and You are the completeness48 of everything.
And when You withdraw from them,
all those names are left like a body without a soul.

You are ‘wise’,
but not with any specific ‘wisdom’.49
You are He that ‘understands’,
but not from any specific ‘understanding’.
You have no specific ‘place’,50
other than to make known Your strength and Your power
to humans,
and to show them how the world is governed,
– through judgement and through mercy,
which are ‘righteousness and justice’ –
according to the deeds of people.

‘Judgement’ is Gevurah,
Justice is ‘the Middle Pillar’‹Tipheret›,
Righteousness∞‹∞tzedeq› is ‘the holy kingdom’‹Malkhut›,
{Lev. 19:36}Scales of righteousness . . . – ‘two pillars of truth’‹Netzaḥ-Hod›,
. . . the ‘hin’ 51 of righteousness . . . – ‘sign of the covenant’‹Yesod›.
All are to show how the world is governed.

Tipheret

∞tzedeq Malkhut

Lev. 19:36

Netzaḥ-Hod

Yesod

But not that You have any specific righteousness –
which is ‘judgement’,
and no specific justice –
which is ‘mercy’.
And none of any of these attributes at all.52

Rise Rabbi Shimon!
And may words be innovated by your hand!
For behold you have permission [Var. it is given to you],
to reveal hidden secrets by your hand,
that for which permission to reveal was not given to any person,
until now.

Arose Rabbi Shimon.
He opened and said:53 {1 Chron. 29:11}To You, Y”Y,
is the greatness and the might . . . etc.54

1 Chron. 29:11

Hear O high ones!
Those sleepers of Hebron,55 and the Faithful Shepherd!
Wake up from your slumber!

Is. 26:19

{Is. 26:19}. . . Wake up and rejoice! O dwellers of the dust . . .
These are the righteous ones,
who are from the aspect56 of whom57 it is stated:
{Song. 5:2}I am asleep, and my heart is awake . . .
And they are not dead.58
And thus, it is said of them:{Is. 26:19} . . . Wake up and rejoice . . . etc.

Song. 5:2

Is. 26:19

Awake O Faithful Shepherd!
Be aroused, you and the Patriarchs,
for the arousal59 of the Shekhinah,
for She sleeps in exile,
for until now the righteous have all been reposing,
and slumber is in their nostrils.

Immediately,
the Shekhinah gives60 [Var. there are aroused] three ‘voices’,61
towards the Faithful Shepherd, and says to him:
‘Rise faithful shepherd!
For about you62 it is stated:{Song. 5:2} . . . the voice of my beloved is knocking . . .
towards Me – with His four letters.’

Song. 5:2

And He shall say through them: ‘ . . . open-up for Me,
My sister, My beloved,
My dove, My 63‘completion’ ∞‹∞tam› . . . ’64
For behold: {Lam. 4:22}Completed ∞‹∞tam› is your sin, O daughter of Zion,
He will not exile you again . . . ’ 65

∞tam

Lam. 4:22

∞tam

Song. 5:2

{Song. 5:2}. . . for my head is full of dew. . . . iii 66
What is the meaning of full of dew?
But the blessed Holy One said:
‘Do you think that since the day the Temple was destroyed,
that I have entered My house,
and that I have entered in settlement?
Not so!
For I do not enter all the while you are in exile.’ iv 67

Behold you have a sign: . . . for my head is full of ‘dew’ ∞r ‹∞tal›‹r39›.
H-E68‹ה־א› is the Shekhinah in exile.69
Her perfection, and Her life is tal ∞r ‹∞ dew›‹r39›.
And this is Y-O-D H-E V-A-V‹r39›.
And H-E‹ה־א›‹6› is the Shekhinah,
Who is not counted of ‘the 39’∞‹∞Ta-L›.

∞tal r39

ה־א

∞ dew r39

r39

ה־א 6

∞Ta-L

But YOD QEi VAV,
whose letters add up numerically to 39,
is He that fills the Shekhinah,
from the fountain of all higher sources.

Immediately, the Faithful Shepherd rose,
and the holy Patriarchs with him.

Until here is ‘the mystery of unity.’70
From here onwards is the first passage of ‘the secrets of the Torah’.71

Until here.

Opened Rabbi Shimon and said:
{Gen. 1:1}In the beginning, ELQYM created . . .
{Ps. 25:14}The ‘secret’ of Y”Y is with those who fear Him,
and his covenant is to let them know it.

Gen. 1:1

Ps. 25:14

The ‘secret’ ∞‹∞sod›‹70› – these are seventy times [Var. faces],72
that the word Be-REiShYT∞‹∞In the beginning› is explained in this passage.73

∞sod 70

∞In the beginning

First Tiqun74 For Day 275

Gen. 1:1

{Gen. 1:1}In the beginning∞‹∞Be-REiShYT› . . .
The letter Beiyt‹ב›‹2› and the word REiShYT ∞‹∞beginning›.

∞Be-REiShYT

ב 2 ∞beginning

Ps. 118:20

{Ps. 118:20}This is the gate to Y”Y, the righteous shall enter therein,
This76 is the gate [Var. fear] of ‘the righteous’,
who have permission to enter there,
[and others] and those who are not

righteous,
are rejected from there.

18a

In it,77 are inscribed and depicted and engraved,
the images of higher and lower.
The depiction of Adam is inscribed there,
and it is a ‘human form’.78

The inscription of the lion is there, to the right,
and the inscription of the ox, to the left,
and the inscription of the eagle, in the middle.

And the mystery of the word:79
{Ez. 1:10}And the image of their faces is the face of a man,
and the face of a lion to the right of the four of them etc.
[four faces for the four of them]
to each ‘beast’80 there are four faces.
These are the four letters of the holy Name
– of YQV”Q – which shines through them.

Ez. 1:10

The king of all the ‘beasts’,
this is ADaM∞‹∞human›‹45›,
who is YOD QE VAV QE‹45›81
which amounts to the same number.

∞human 45

45

The Adamic form is the Holy Shekhinah,82
for She is His image.
She is His seal, [His form],
and about Her it is stated:{Song. 8:6} Place me as a seal upon your heart.

Song. 8:6

For thus did the Shekhinah say, [Var. Israel says in exile],
‘Even though Thou shalt ascend upwards [from the world],
may Your image never leave me forever,’

Like that seal,
which is in that place,
in which is adhered the impression,
of the Master of the seal.
The image of the seal is not removed from it,
so that He may be recognised by it.
And therefore, Knesset Yisrael 83 said: [Var: Israel said in exile:]
Place me as a seal upon your heart.

Like the impression of the phylacteries∞‹∞tephilin›84 of the hand,
which correspond to the heart . . . like a seal upon your arm,
like the phylacteries of the head which are dangling,
straps to all sides – unto the heart and the arm,
and through them they are inscribed,
for they are the People of ‘the blessed Holy One’.85

∞tephilin

And furthermore:
Place me as a seal
 – this is the seal of the sign of the holy covenant of circumcision,
and it is the sign of the covenant of the holy Sabbath and festivals.

. . . for love is as strong as death . . .
 – harsh86 is the separation,
of the blessed Holy One and the Shekhinah,
from Israel,
as the separation of the soul and spirit and animating-soul,87
from the body.88

and further: . . . for love is as strong as death,
when Israel unify the Name of the blessed Holy One in love,
and they say: ‘Who chooses His People Israel with love’.v

. . . it is as hard as hell,89 the jealousy – of the blessed Holy One,
with which He is jealous over them, when they shall go out of exile,
for He will be, at that time: {Naḥ. 1:2} . . . zealous and vengeful,90
. . . and possessing anger . . .

Naḥ. 1:2

Song. 8:6

{Song. 8:6}. . . its sparks are sparks of fire . . .
At that time, the ‘left’91 will be aroused in its flames,
which are {Song. 8:6} . . . flashes of fire, the ‘flame of Y-Q’ ∞‹∞shalhavetyah›,92
and it will burn numerous chambers of the houses of idol worship,
and it will take revenge upon ’Amaleq,93
for He has promised by the two letters of the holy Name,
which are Y-Q,
to take revenge from it. It is this that is written: {Ex. 17:16}
And He said: ‘ . . . for a hand is upon the throne of Y-Q . . . ’
and this is . . . the flashes of fire – the flame of Y-Q.

Song. 8:6

∞shalhavetyah

Ex. 17:16

And Israel say: ‘Master of the Universe!
Even though I am far from You in exile,94
Place me as a seal upon Your heart . . .
and let not Your image be removed from us,
for She is Your seal, Your Shekhinah,
for whose sake You were remembering us95 in exile,
and the seal of the blessed Holy One is specifically the Shekhinah.

She is the letter ב‹Beiyt›,
specifically, with Her, does the Torah open with Beiyt‹ב›,
and this is Be-REiShYT:
the letter Beiyt and the word reishyt ∞‹∞beginning›.
Beiyt∞‹∞house of› is surely the treasure store of everything,
about it is stated: {Is. 33:6} . . . the fear of Y”Y is His treasure.

Beiyt

ב

∞beginning

∞house of

Is. 33:6

And this is: [Second Tiqun]96

[Be-REiShYT ∞‹∞In the beginning›

∞In the beginning

Many times, in the Torah, there is reishyt∞‹∞beginning›,
and each one is explained in its place.

∞beginning

The first is: {Prov. 8:22}Y”Y has acquired me as the ‘beginning’ ∞‹∞reishyt› of His way . . .
and this is the Torah,
in which there are cantillation notes, and vowel points and letters,
and many positive and negative commandments,
all of which depend upon the Name YQV”Q,
It is this that is written:{Ex. 3:15} . . . this is My Name for ever etc.
ShMY ∞‹∞My Name›‹r350› with Y-Q‹r15› is 365,
ZiKhRY ∞‹∞My remembrance›‹r237› with V-Q‹r11› is 248.97
The 365 of the left, from ‘the fearing’ of Gevurah were they given
– the ‘terror of Isaac’.]

∞reishyt

∞My Name r350 r15

∞My remembrance r237 r11

Second Tiqun[Third Tiqun] Second Tiqun98 For Day 399

Be-REiShYT
The word YiR-AT ∞‹∞fear of› is contained in there,100
what remains of these letters is Sh-B,
and the mystery of the word is ShuV∞‹∞return!›

∞fear of

∞return!

– in ‘the awe of Y”Y’.
And if there is no fear, there is no wisdom,
as they have established:vi ‘If there is no awe there is no wisdom∞‹∞ḥokhmah›’,
because awe is the treasure-store of wisdom,101
it is its secret repository,
it is its hiding place,
it is the house of the King.102

18b

∞ḥokhmah

Tiqun ThreeAnd this is: Tiqun Three,103 like this:

Be-REiShYT∞‹∞In the beginning›
contains RoSh∞‹∞head› and BaYiT ∞‹∞house›,
and the mystery of the word: {Prov. 24:3}In wisdom will a house be built . . .
And one who wishes to see the king,
has not permission to see him except in his house,
and the mystery of the word:
Wisdom‹Ḥokhmah› is not recognised except ‘in its house’‹Binah›.104

∞In the beginning

∞head ∞house

Prov. 24:3

Ḥokhmah Binah

Similarly,105 ‘the Middle Pillar’‹Tipheret›,106
which is YQVQ,
is not made known to a prophet or seer,
except in His ‘chamber’,
which is ADNY‹65›,
and the mystery of the word: {Ḥab. 2:20}And Y”Y is in His holy chamber∞‹∞heikhal›‹65› . . .

Tipheret

65

∞heikhal 65

[and it is: {Ps. 63:3}Thus ‘in holiness’ ∞‹∞ba-qodesh› have I beheld You . . .

412

And it is comprised of seven chambers of seven lands,107
and about them did David say:

and the Middle Pillar comprises seven firmaments,
and about them did David say: {Ps. 115:16}
The heavens are the heavens of Y’Y’ . . .

Ps. 116:9

Ps. 115:16

And there is no knowledge at all,
– of the King, and His garments, and His ‘arrangements’∞‹∞tiquneih›,108
– for any person in the world,
until he enters His house and His chamber,
which is the letter Beiyt‹ב›, and about it is stated:
{Is. 56:7} . . . for My house ∞‹∞beiyt› shall be called a house of prayer,
for all the nations.

∞tiquneih

ב

Is. 56:7

∞beiyt

And one who is a ‘man’∞‹∞adam›,
in the image of ‘the Middle Pillar’‹Tipheret›,
of him it is said:vii ‘the prayer of man is not heard
except in the synagogue’,109
and thus have the Masters of the Mishnah established.

∞adam

Tipheret

And one who ‘guards the covenant’,110
is called ‘the man of perfection’,111
and there, in Be-REiShYT, is a ‘covenant of fire’∞‹∞BRYT EiSh›,
for he guards it from the fire of hell.112
But one who is occupied in the Torah and guards it,113
is called ‘man’ in the image of He that is above,
It is this that is written: {Is. 44:13} . . . like the glory∞‹∞tipheret›114 of a man,
to dwell in the house.

∞BRYT EiSh

Is. 44:13

∞tipheret

Come see:
Of everyone who guards the sign of the covenant,
his image is inscribed in the Shekhinah‹Malkhut› and ‘the Righteous One’‹Yesod›,
and yet of one who strives in the Torah,
his image is inscribed in ‘the Middle Pillar’‹Tipheret›.

Malkhut Yesod

Tipheret

Tiqun Four115

Be-REiShYT
It is written: {Ps. 118:19}Open for me the gates of righteousness,
I shall enter through them, I shall acknowledge Y-Q.
Open for me . . . – these are the two eyelids,
which open and shut,
and about them it is stated:
{Ex. 25:20} And the cherubs shall be spreading their wings upwards . . .
[cherubs] – these are the two cherubs of the eyes,
spreading wings – the eyelids.

Ps. 118:19

Ex. 25:20

And furthermore:
Open for me the gates of righteousness . . .
– these are the two eyes.

When they are [Var. that the eyes are] {Ps. 27:11}looking ‘in a straight way’,
it is stated of them: . . . and their faces are one to the other . . . 116
And when they are not looking ‘in a straight way’,
then: {Is. 27:1}the crooked serpent 117 is there,
about which it is stated:{Rut. 1:17} . . . for death shall separate . . . etc.
[Var. see Hos. 13:15 “and it shall separate between ‘brothers’.”]118

Ps. 27:11

Is. 27:1

Rut. 1:17

The three colours of the eye are the three Patriarchs,
of whom it is stated: {Ex. 6:14}These are the heads of their fathers’ house . . .
The ‘eye’s daughter’∞‹∞ bat ’ayin› the pupil
which is thin119 and small,
– this is the Shekhinah,
Who participates with the Patriarchs.
And about Her it is stated: {Ps. 17:8}Guard me,
as the ‘pupil of the eye’s daughter’ . . .
and all is within the mystery of Be-REiShYT:
there is RASheY ∞‹∞heads of›; there is BaT ∞‹∞daughter›.

Ex. 6:14

∞ bat ’ayin

Ps. 17:8

∞heads of ∞daughter

Rabbi Shimon rose to his feet and said:
‘Master of the Universe!
Open my eyes that I may gaze above through them.
I shall enter ‘through them’ ∞‹∞vam›‹42›,
with ‘the forty-two letters of the explicit Name’,120
to know each-and-every letter upon

∞vam 42

its proper order.’121

19a

and they are:122

‘Blessed be the Name of His glorious kingdom for ever and ever.’ viii

∞In the beginning

Gen. 1:2

Each-and-every letter,
it has an ‘utterance’, and it has a ‘pathway’.123
There are ten utterances, and thirty-two pathways.124
And they are all suspended from A-Y-Q.125
And this is:{Ps. 118:19} . . . I shall ‘thank’ YaQ.
A-Y-H is the numerical value of ‘I shall thank’∞r ‹∞AUDeH›‹r16›Y-Q.
[Y-Q is Ḥokhmah and Binah, Aleph‹א› is Higher Keter]

Ps. 118:19

∞AUDeH r16

א

And there are seven sephirot,
included in seven Names.126
And all-of-them include the ‘daughter of seven’∞‹∞Bat Shev’a›‹Malkhut›.
And there is no sephirah, amongst any of the sephirot,
that has permission to bestow blessing or to influence those below
– except through Bat Sheva∞‹∞daughter of seven›.

∞Bat Shev’a Malkhut

∞daughter of seven

Because She is the ‘binding’ of all the sephirot.
For if the sephirot would ‘pour’ outside of Her,
there would be ‘separation’,127
and thus, there is no permission for a sephirah to pour to any place
– except from Her –
towards those below.

And thus, is stated of Her:
{Jer. 9:22}Let not the wise man boast of his wisdom . . . etc.
. . . except in ‘this’ ∞‹∞zot›.128

Jer. 9:22

∞zot

Lev. 16:3

{Lev. 16:3}In this∞‹∞zot› manner shall Aaron approach the sacred . . .
For no prophet or sage has permission,
to know anything knowable above,
except through Her.‹Malkhut›129

∞zot

Malkhut

And because of Her, it is stated: {Ex. 19:3}And Moses ascended to ELQYM . . .
And David, because of Her, said: {Ps. 132:4–5}I shall not give sleep to my eyes,
nor slumber to my eyelids.
Until I find a place for Y”Y . . .

Ex. 19:3

Ps. 132:4–5

It∞130‹∞ihu›‹Malkhut› is the completion of the ‘human’∞‹∞adam›,
the completion of the Unity,
the completion of the Holy Name,
the completion of each-and-every sephirah.

∞ihu Malkhut ∞adam

Tiqun Five,131 For Day 4

Be-REiShYT is composed of the letter בּ‹Beiyt› and reishyt ∞‹∞beginning›,
a point within its chamber.132

Beiyt ∞beginning

And this point is Hidden Thought.133

Meanwhile, Elijah ‘happened’134 towards him Rabbi Shimon.
He said to him: ‘Rabbi! Rabbi!135
But the Beiyt‹ב› is open!136
In what way, therefore, is the Thought within it hidden?’

ב

But137 at the beginning of the ‘will of ascension’138 of the King,
‘lamp of darkness’,139
when He measured out a chord,140,
from this point there emerged a line,
which spark-blocked that thought,141
like this: ם‹Mem›

Mem

At first, it is a blocked Mem‹ם›,
and when the line which is the letter ו‹Vav› is extended,
from ‘the measure’,
it is opened and made into ב‹Beiyt›,
and this is Be-REiShYT – Beiyt followed by REiShYT ∞‹∞beginning›
– a point in its chamber.

ם

Vav

Beiyt

∞beginning

And when it is the blocked ם‹Mem›,
it is the Large Mem‹ם›142 of: {Is. 9:6}To him who increases∞‹∞le-Mםarbeh› the authority . . . 143
[Var. le-Marbeh is the gematria of ’ezer∞‹∞help›‹r277› or zer’a ∞‹∞seed›‹r277›,
in that chamber, he144 sowed seeds for his ‘correction’∞‹∞tiquna›,
ha-misrah∞‹∞the authority› is the gematria of the word tiqun
when counted together with the letters and the word,
and this is ‘the large Mem’]
and it is made into a ring.

Mem

ם ∞le-Mםarbeh

Is. 9:6

∞help r277 ∞seed r277

∞tiquna

∞the authority

And for its sake, it is said to a bride:
‘Be thou sanctified unto me with this ring:’ ם‹Mem›
and about it is said:ix
‘the bind of formlessness145 implanted in the ring.’
And it is neither white nor red,
nor black nor green nor any colour at all.
And when it is extended to shine,
it is made into colours [Var. seven colours] with which to shine.

Mem

And the mystery of the word:
{Ps. 104:2}You enwrap light like a garment . . . etc.
When the light∞‹∞aur› is ‘enwrapped’,
and not extended and is blocked,
it is called ‘air’,∞‹∞avyr›146
‘light’ blocked by the letter Yod,
the point in its chamber.

Ps. 104:2

∞aur

∞avyr

When Yod‹י› emerges from avyr∞‹∞air›,
aur∞‹∞light›, is revealed.
And this is: {Gen. 1:3}And ELQYM said: ‘Let there be light’ . . .
And there are five mentions of ‘light’ in the act of creation,147
and they are Hei‹ה›‹5›.

י ∞air

∞light

Gen. 1:3

ה 5

And about them it is stated:
{Is. 40:12}Who has measured the waters with his step . . .
– and this is the right arm, and it is the colour white.
. . . and gauged the heavens with his span . . .
– this is the left arm, which is the colour red.
. . . and the dust of the earth all in a large bowl
 – this is the body, the Middle Pillar, and this is the colour green.
. . . and has weighed mountains with a scale,

Is. 40:12

and hills in the balance.
– the two pillars of truth.
And this Hei‹ה›‹5› is extended,
to shine through five colours,
which are the ‘five times light’.148

19b

ה 5

Yod‹י›‹r10› is Her measure,
the Higher Hei is the ‘five’ of light,
the lower Hei is the five colours,
through which the five of light shine.
And when the Higher Hei is extended,
to shine through the lower Hei,
with her five [shining] colours,
then Vav‹ו› is immediately extended towards Her.149

י r10

ו

And this is:{Ps. 104:2} . . . He extends the heavens like a curtain.
For surely, when She shines with Her colours,
it is stated of Her:{Gen. 9:16} . . . and I shall see it,150
to remember the eternal covenant . . .
. . . and I shall see it . . . – in Her jewels, like a bride,
bejewelled for Her Husband.
And then immediately: . . . He stretches forth the heavens . . .
For He, Her Husband, is towards Her.

Ps. 104:2

Gen. 9:16

And this is the mystery of the ‘line of measure’,151
which is ו‹Vav›,
from that measure which is Yod‹י›.
And after She has taken the Holy Name,
She is made that measure from bottom to top.

Vav

י

Just as the point י‹Yod›‹r10›,
is a measure for ‘ten curtains’,
so is She a ‘cubit’∞‹∞amah› of six tephaḥim,
from the aspect of the letter Vav‹6›,
inclusive of ten cubits.
It is this that is written: {Ex. 26:16}Ten cubits is the length of the board . . .
and this is the letter Yod‹י›.
And a cubit . . . is the Higher Hei.
. . . and half a cubit . . . is the lower Hei.
The length of one cubit – this is Vav.
And why is the lower Hei called half a cubit?
Because She is called ‘the broken matzah’152
– the bread of poverty.

Yod r10

∞amah

6

– when it ascends to Aleph‹א›,
which is ‘the concealed air’153 –
is called qametz‹ָ›,154 the closed handful.

a full handful . . .
and it is Hidden Thought – the blocked ם‹Mem›.

∞qamatz

Mem

What is its key? the vowel-sign ‘pataḥ’‹ ַ ›!
And this is ו‹Vav›.155

like this: [Var. ָ ‹qametz›]

qametz

Who is ‘the firmament’?
It is the ‘Righteous One’∞‹∞tzadiq›.

the higher crown160 is She]

on the head of Father and Mother,

Is. 62:3

She is Yod‹י› in every place.
Her ‘tip’164 is above,
and Her body is in the middle,
and Her end is below,
‘the totality of the letters’165 of the explicit Name.

י

Her head above,
is of the mystery of ‘cantillation notes’,
and Her body in the middle,
is of the mystery [Var. the totality] of the letters,
a body for both-of-them,
and her tip below,
is of the mystery of the vowel points.

And below, this point is ‘female waters’,166
and above, ‘male waters’.x
A firmament in the middle like this: א‹Aleph›.
Upon it is stated: {Gen. 1:6} . . . and let it separate,
between waters and waters.

Aleph

Gen. 1:6

And this is the meaning of:xi
‘a dispute which is for the sake of heaven,
whose purpose will endure’,
to bring about peace and unity in both-of-them,
and not a dispute of separation,
such as the dispute of Koraḥ167 and his assembly with Aaron.

And this debate which is for the sake of Heaven
is because the lower waters are crying,168 and saying:
‘We want to be before the King, the Cause of all causes!’
They want to ascend above.
But a firmament separates between them,169
until the Cause of all causes makes them equal.

∞reshut

∞reshut

Ps. 104:20

Worthy is he who encounters Her, like Jacob,
of whom it is stated: {Gen. 28:11}And he encountered the place,
and he sojourned there because the sun had set . . .
until Her Master came and watched over Her,
and he was there,191 with Her,
from there onwards
they established it night-prayer as an obligation.192

Gen. 28:11

But on the Sabbath,
She is ‘a private domain’,
for She is in the domain of Her Husband,
and not like the night,
when She is alone, in Her own domain.
It is this that is written: {Lam. 1:1}How alone She sits . . .

Lam. 1:1

And Jacob,
because he drew her near to Her Master with his encounter,
he certainly made it the evening prayer an obligation.
And when the sun comes in the morning,
of which it is stated: {Ps. 84:12}For a sun and a shield is Y”Y ELQYM,
then it is stated of him: {Gen. 32:32} . . . and the sun rose upon him . . . 193

Ps. 84:12

Gen. 32:32

which is the knot of the tephilin∞‹∞phylacteries› of the hand,
he binds Her to him,
so that She would not move from him forever.

∞phylacteries

he binds Her with the phylacteries∞‹∞tephilin› of the hand,
which is on the left arm.

∞tephilin

From the right-hand side,
he places for Her a crown upon his head,
the phylacteries of the head.

And this, on the day when She is bound with

Her Master,

and then . . . they shall find me.195

20b

Prov. 1:28

when She is without Her Master,
and She is a domain∞‹∞re-shut› unto Herself,
it is stated of Her:xvii
‘Do not become known to the authorities∞‹∞re-shut›’.196
And therefore, did David say:

∞re-shut

∞re-shut

Until here is the mystery of qametz‹ ָ ›,
which is the mystery of higher and lower Thought
[Var. high and low],
which is ‘the point in the domain of Her Master’,
Who is ו‹Vav›– the firmament.

 ָ

Vav

And a pataḥ‹ ַ ›, which is without a point,
is a domain unto itself,
and a point without a pataḥ,
is a domain unto itself.

 ַ

For just as letters are male and female,
so are vowel-points male and female,
but letters are to points,
like the body in relation to the spirit.

And so is a point in a Vav‹ו›,
such as ḥolem‹ ֹ› or ḥireq‹ִ› or shureq‹ּ›.
A ḥolem above ו‹Vav› makes it a ז‹Zayin ›,
a ḥireq below is made a tail – ג‹Gimel›.
A shureq in the middle,
the tip of the letter Dalet‹ד›, a tip in the middle.
And all is one: {Is. 44:6} I am first and I am last,
and besides Me there is no god.

From the aspect of א‹Aleph› which is composed of יוי‹Yod-Vav-Yod 26›,
which adds up to YQVQ‹26›,
was the blessed Holy One, and His Name, alone with the crown‹Keter›
– before the world was created –
until it arose in thought to create Adam,
who is the י‹Yod› at the top of the א‹Aleph›,

Aleph Yod-Vav-Yod 26

26

Keter

Yod Aleph

And through the vowel-points of the letters,
are made known all the sephirot.
For there are nine vowel points,
and in them there are 14∞ ‹∞YaD›sparks,
and upon them is stated: {Ex. 14:8}. . . and the Children of Israel,
went out with a high ‘hand’ ∞‹∞yad›‹r14›.

∞YaD

Ex. 14:8

∞yad r14

And they correspond to the joints of the five fingers,
which are YaD∞∞‹∞14 ∞hand›.
And two ‘firmaments’ are there:
one from qametz, and one from pataḥ,
corresponding to the two limbs∞‹∞qanei› of the arm.
And each spark is a joint, and it is a measure,
and a ‘firmament’ is a ‘cubit’∞‹∞amah› of 6 tephaḥs and a ‘reed’∞‹∞qaneh›,
and ‘the line of measure’.

∞14 ∞hand

∞qanei

∞amah ∞qaneh

The cantillation notes are from the crown,201
and they are the top of the Middle Pillar.
The vowel points are from the brain,202
and they are ‘the blessings of the head of the righteous’,
as it says:203{Prov. 10:6} Blessings to the head of the righteous one . . .
And they are the three drops that are drawn from the brain,204
towards the covenant of circumcision.

Prov. 10:6

The letters are from the aspect of Higher Mother,
and all are incorporated in Malkhut.

And the points to the letters are like a soul to the body.
For a body is like a horse to the rider.
And the letters are open to the vowel-points to receive them,
and upon them it is stated:
{Ez. 1:11} . . . and their wings were separated from above . . . 205
to receive vowel-points upon them,
and a vowel-point, in every place,
is a heavenly echo∞‹∞bat qol›.

Ez. 1:11

∞bat qol

The cantillation notes are weapons of war.206

Rapheh‹ ֿ ›207 is above the letters,208
and upon it is stated: {Ez. 1:22}And the image upon the heads of the ḥayah,
was of a firmament, like the hue of the awesome ice,
stretched over their heads from above.

 ֿ

Ez. 1:22

Stretched – this is rapheh,
stretched over the heads of the ḥayot,
which are [YQV”Q – 4] letters, surely.

Dagesh‹ ּ ›209 is inside the letters, like this: יּקּוּקּ,
Rapheh‹ ֿ › is outside, like this: יֿקֿוֿקֿ,210
and they are like ‘a bridle∞‹∞meteg›211 and curb’ for the letters,
and of them: {Ez. 1:14}And the ḥayot were running and returning . . .
running – with dagesh,
and returning – with rapheh.

 ּ

 ֿ

∞meteg

Ez. 1:14

Sixth Tiqun212

Be-REiShYT∞‹∞In the beginning›

∞In the beginning

21a

Rabbi Shimon arose,
and he said to Elijah: [Var. Elijah!]213 ‘Elijah!
I adjure you by the holy kingdom‹Malkhut›,214
Who is fallen in exile!
Take leave not to depart from us!
For the Shekhinah and Her host are watching out for you,
the ministering angels – of whom it is stated:
{Is. 33:7}Behold their mighty ones215 are shouting outside,
screaming outside their chambers:
“There is none to receive the prayers of Israel!”

Malkhut

Is. 33:7

Many birds216 are chirping,
in prayers, towards their mother,217
those that are nesting upon the earth,
who are watching out for you!
And they are all called ‘birds’,
after the name of the bird’s nest,218
which is Holy Mother, of whom it is stated:
{Deut. 22:6}When a bird’s nest will happen to be before you . . . 219
And upon Her it is stated: {Ps. 84:4}Even the bird has found a home∞‹∞bayit› . . .

Deut. 22:6

Ps. 84:4

∞bayit

And this220 is the letter Beiyt‹ב› of Be-REiShYT,
of which it is stated: {Prov. 24:3}In wisdom∞‹∞ḥokhmah› will a house be built . . .

ב

Prov. 24:3

∞ḥokhmah

Ps. 84:4

{Ps. 84:4} . . . and the freedom221 of the nest is hers . . . 222
this is Higher Mother, the ‘jubilee’,223 of which is stated:
{Lev. 25:10}And you shall proclaim freedom throughout the land . . .

Lev. 25:10

When the bird has found a home,
which is the Temple,
and it becomes built and fixed, then immediately,
freedom – which is the Higher Shekhinah –
finds [Var. there is found]
a nest for Herself, above [Var. from above].
And immediately: {Ps. 84:4} . . . who has placed ∞‹∞shatah›224 her chicks . . .
 – these are her six∞‹∞shyt› sons,
– six sephirot – which are ‘the six days of active work’,
all of whom fly up towards Her,
on the many Festivals and appointed times and holydays.
And the chicks, who are Israel below,
all fly up with Her in exile.

Ps. 84:4

∞shatah

∞shyt

And when they are but ‘eggs’,
for they do not have the wings of positive commandments,
with which to fly,
it is stated of Her: {Deut. 22:6} . . . do not take the mother upon the children.
If so, what is the meaning of when a nest will happen to be . . . ?
But when the Shekhinah has no ‘place’,
in which to reside there permanently,
She goes about by happenstance. And this is:xviii
‘Anyone who sets a permanent place for his prayer . . . etc.’

Deut. 22:6

As souls act, so does the Shekhinah abide with them:
a soul which is habitual in prayer or in Torah,
is a permanent place for the Shekhinah to abide therein.
But a soul which is not habitual in prayer or in Torah,
unless encountered through happenstance,
so, She also, abides upon it through happenstance.

And this is: when a bird’s nest happens before you . . . etc.
For surely, the soul [Var. that prayer] is a bird’s nest,
[and so, that soul of a person is called ‘a bird’s nest’]
and the body is a ‘nest’225 for the soul.

And thus souls,
which are Her ‘maidens’,
for they are called {Ps. 45:15} . . . the virgins following her, her companions . . .
dwell in bodies, which are their nest, by way of happenstance,
when they are not habitually in synagogues and houses of study.
And this is: When a bird’s nest ‘happens’ before you . . .

Ps. 45:15

And furthermore:
The ‘bird’s nest’ above is the Throne,
and Her nest below is Metatro”n.
And regarding it is stated: {Num. 14:18} . . . and will not acquit∞‹∞naqeh› . . .
The word qan∞‹∞nest› is there,
and this is: {Naḥ. 1:2} . . . jealous∞‹∞qano› and revenging∞‹∞noqem› . . .

Num. 14:18

∞naqeh

∞nest

Naḥ. 1:2

∞qano ∞noqem

When a nest in which to abide is not found,
then{Deut. 22:6} . . . on the way . . .
This is that of which it is stated:
{Josh. 5:4} . . . they died in the desert ‘on the way’,
in their going out from Egypt.226

Deut. 22:6

Josh. 5:4

And furthermore:
. . . on the way . . . – this is the burial of Rachel,
which is upon a crossroads∞‹∞pharashat aurḥin›,
and upon it is stated:
{Jer. 9:1}Would that I had a guests’ ∞‹∞aurḥim›227 lodging in the desert . . .
And they are ‘the two messiahs’,228
who shall pass through there,
when they come to redeem Israel.

∞pharashat aurḥin

Jer. 9:1

∞aurḥim

Deut. 22:6

{Deut. 22:6} . . . in any tree . . . – this is ‘the tree of life’,
of which it is stated: {Prov. 3:18}It is a tree of life to them that take hold of it . . .
And upon it is stated:
{Deut. 20:19} . . . because the human229 is a tree of the field . . . 230

Prov. 3:18

Deut. 20:19

And furthermore:
{Deut. 22:6}. . . in any tree . . . – this is the Righteous One,
Who is: {Gen. 1:11} . . . a tree making fruit of its kind . . .
And this is the Sabbath day,
for it is there that is the coupling of the Shekhinah
with the blessed Holy One.
And there, She has [Var. He has] relief,
and upon that is stated:
{Ps. 1:3}And it shall be as a tree planted by rivulets of water,
that will give its fruit in its season . . .
This is ‘the time of the Righteous One,’231
which is Sabbath eve.
For from the Righteous One fly-forth new souls in Israel
– on the Sabbath eve –
which are called [Var. therefore, they are called], ‘new faces’.232

Deut. 22:6

Gen. 1:11

Ps. 1:3

Chicks – these are the scholars,
for whose sake the Shekhinah resides upon Israel,
or eggs – these are the school children,
for whose sake the Shekhinah resides upon Israel,
and these are ‘the Masters of Scripture’.
And when they are occupied in ‘Torah’ or in ‘precept’∞‹∞ mitzvah›,
– which are the blessed Holy One and the Shekhinah –
and cause Them to join as one,
they inherit souls from there,
and they are called ‘children’ of the blessed Holy One.

∞ mitzvah

Because ‘the Masters of Scripture’ and ‘the Masters of Mishnah’,
they are from Her wings

of Her wings, and therefore:
{Deut. 22:6} . . . and the mother is lying upon the chicks, or on the eggs . . .
She is lying upon them with Her four wings,
of which it is stated: {Ez. 1:6} . . . and four wings . . .

21b

Deut. 22:6

Ez. 1:6

The small-faced233 sucklings [Var. infants],
each one has four faces,
and Mother lies upon them, above them,
and at times She is upon them,
and at times She withdraws from them.

But children who are from the innards,
[Var. over whom it is stated:
{Jer. 31:19}therefore my innards are moved for him],
beloved children,
over whom Her ‘innards are moved’,
who are the Masters of Qabalah,
of them it is stated:{Deut. 22:6} . . . do not take the mother upon the children,
for Mother does not depart from them for ever.

Jer. 31:19

Deut. 22:6

For surely, the blessed Holy One is ‘Torah,’
and the Shekhinah is ‘mitzvah’ ∞‹∞ precept›.
Worthy is the one who is occupied in them to unite Them!

∞ precept

And thus, {Ex. 20:8}Remember . . . and {Deut. 5:12}Observe . . .
are the blessed Holy One and His Shekhinah.
Worthy is one who unifies them on the Sabbath day,
which is Yesod,234
and with the love and fear of Y-H,
which are Father and Mother.
[Remember and Observe] These correspond to:
the phylacteries∞‹∞tephilin› of the head – Yod‹י›,235
and the phylacteries of the hand – Hei‹ה›,
male and female.

Ex. 20:8 Deut. 5:12

∞tephilin י

ה

And worthy is he who unites Them in ‘the recitation of the Shm’a’,
in fear and love.
For when Israel strives,
in the Written Torah and in the Oral Torah,
with love and fear,
it is stated of them: Do not take the mother upon the children.

But when they are not striving in them,
with love and fear,
it is stated of them: You shall surely send away the mother . . .

When Israel keeps the Sabbath,
with Remember and Observe,
with fear and love,
it is stated of them:{Deut. 22:6} Do not take the mother upon the children . . .
And if not, it is written of them:{Deut. 22:7} You shall surely send away . . . etc.
 – two dismissals.

Deut. 22:6

Deut. 22:7

And when Israel unite the blessed Holy One,
through the phylacteries of the hand,
and the phylacteries of the head,
in fear and love,
it is stated of them:{Deut. 22:6} . . . do not take the mother upon the children,
and if not, then {Deut. 22:7}You shall surely send away . . .

Deut. 22:6

Deut. 22:7

And when they fulfil the precept of the covenant of circumcision,
and remove the foreskin from themselves,
and perform the act of pri’ah,236
with fear and love,
it is stated of them: Do not take the mother upon the children,
and if not, then You shall surely send away the mother . . .

When they are united237 in their couplings,
with the sanctification of marriage and the seven blessings,
which are their unity, in sanctity and in blessing,
it is stated of them: Do not take the mother upon the children . . .
but if not, then You shall surely send away . . .

And Israel, they are in exile, in the ‘other’ domain,
for when they do not unite in their couplings,
with the rites of sanctification and the seven blessings,238
which are their unity in sanctity and blessing,
then instead of holiness – impurity resides upon them,
and instead of blessing – cursing resides upon them,
and instead of unity – separation resides upon them.

And this causes exile for the Shekhinah,
who is driven from Her place and Her nesting,
which is Jerusalem. It is this that is written:
. . . {Is. 50:1}and through your sins was your mother sent away.
Two ‘sendings’ are implied by {Deut. 22:7}You shall surely send ∞‹∞shaleiaḥ te-shalaḥ› . . .
 – one from the First Temple,
– and one from the Second Temple.

Is. 50:1

Deut. 22:7

∞shaleiaḥ te-shalaḥ

And should you say,
that the blessed Holy One is not driven with them,239
therefore, Scripture states: {Prov. 27:8}Like a bird wandering from her nest,
so is a man who wanders from his place
 – so as to guard Her in exile, from the foreign domain.

Prov. 27:8

It is this that is written: {Is. 42:8}I am Y”Y, that is My Name,
and My glory I shall not give to another . . . etc.
. . . to another . . . – this means another god, this is Samael,
. . . to idols . . . – those appointed over the seventy nations.240

Is. 42:8

And because of Her, the blessed Holy One is:
{Song. 7:6} . . . a king imprisoned in tresses ∞‹∞re-hatim›.
He is imprisoned with them, through the phylacteries of the head,
which is the glory of the head,
for the phylacteries of the head,
are in the place of ‘the channels∞‹∞re-hitei› of the brain’,241
– and this is the meaning of: . . . imprisoned in tresses∞‹∞re-hatim›,
and He is bound∞‹∞ḥavush› with them,
through the phylacteries of the hand,
through the tie of the hand.
And this is as is written: {Ez. 24:17} . . . bind ∞‹∞ḥavosh› your headdress upon you . . .

Song. 7:6

∞re-hatim

∞re-hitei

∞re-hatim

∞ḥavush

Ez. 24:17

∞ḥavosh

And because He is bound with them in exile,
it is statedxix of Him:
‘A prisoner does not release himself from prison’.
And the Shekhinah, She is His prison,
because of Her love, He is ‘imprisoned’ in Her.
And the mystery of the word is:
{Song. 1:13}A bundle of myrrh is my beloved to me,
between my breasts he shall lodge . . .

Song. 1:13

And because of this, whoever wants to apprehend the King,
does not have permission to apprehend Him,
except through the Shekhinah.
It is this that is written: {Jer. 9:22–23}Let not boast . . . etc.

Song. 6:1

For it is because of You,
that He descends upon us.245

For He does not depart from us246,
except that we have not behaved respectfully towards You.

For it is because of You,
that He is held captive with us, all six days,247
it is this that is written:
{Ez. 46:1} . . . it shall be closed 248 for the six days of work,
and on the Sabbath day it shall be open,
and on the day of New Moon, it shall be open.

Ez. 46:1

For so is the Shekhinah concealed249 with Him on weekdays,
like a rose that is closed-up.250
And on the day of Sabbath,
and the day of New Moon and Festival days,
She is opened to receive scents and perfumes,
and to bequeath souls and delights to their children.

Woe to humans!
For the blessed Holy One is captive with them in exile,251
and the Shekhinah is captive with them.252

which is repentance∞‹∞te-shuvah› – Higher Mother‹Binah› –

Ex. 2:12

{Ex. 2:12}And he turned this way and that,
and he saw that there was no man . . .
But rather each man had turned to his own way,
with their own occupations,
with their own journeys,
{Is. 56:11} . . . each man to his own profit from his own quarter,
with the profit of this world,
in order to inherit this world.

Is. 56:11

And they are not of the aspect of those of whom it is stated:
{Ex. 18:21} . . . men of valour, those who fear ELQYM,
men of truth, haters of illicit gain . . .
Rather, they are all crying out in prayer on the Day of Atonement, like dogs:
‘Give!265 Give us sustenance,
and forgiveness and atonement and life
– write us for life!’
And they are brazen like dogs,
which are the nations of the world,
who cry out to Him and have no shame.

Ex. 18:21

For there is no-one who calls them to repent,
so that the Shekhinah be returned to the blessed Holy One,
from Whom She is far,
to return Her to Him.

And they are likened to dogs,
of which it is stated: {Ps. 106:35}And they mingled with the nations,
and they learnt their ways,
and these are ‘the mixed multitude’,266
that whatever kindness they do, they do for their own benefit.267

Ps. 106:35

And furthermore:
they request sustenance and clothing and sexual fulfilment,268
which is the sexual fulfilment of their couplings,
of which it is stated:
{Ex. 21:10} . . . her provisions, her covering, and her sexual fulfilment,
he shall not diminish . . .

Ex. 21:10

And there are none who request the real sustenance,
which is Torah,
the ‘provision’ of the Shekhinah,
and which is Higher Mother,
of whom it is stated: {Prov. 1:8} . . . do not forsake the Torah of your mother.269

Ex. 22:26

And these are the three ‘garments’,
of the three coverings,
of the three colours of the eye,
which are the garments of ‘the daughter of the eye’,
which is the soul.
And of these three it is stated:

Ex. 23:17

And corresponding to these three colours [Var. times]
are the three colours of a candle,275
of which it is stated: {Ex. 3:2}And an angel of Y”Y appeared to him,
in a flame∞‹∞labat› of fire, from the midst of the bush . . .
And there appeared . . . – this is one colour,
in a flame of the fire, from the midst of the bush . . .
– this is a second colour,
And he saw, and behold the bush was burning in fire . . .
– this is three colours.
And they correspond to the three colours of the eye.
. . . in a flame of the fire . . . – this is ‘the daughter of the eye’∞‹∞bat ’ayin›.

At that time,
when the three colours of the eye are shining,
which correspond to the three colours of the bow,276
then immediately:

The light of the eye is the Middle Pillar
– ‘the daughter of the eye’ the pupil277 is its house.
At that time,
when the cloud is cleared from the daughter of the eye,
of which it is stated: {Lam. 3:44}You have covered Yourself in a cloud . . . etc.
which is the cataract278 of the eye, which is ‘Greater Rome’,279
the Higher Shekhinah is destined to say to the blessed Holy One:

when ‘I’ ∞‹∞anokhi› have cleared the house?

∞anokhi

Ex. 20:2

∞Anokhi

And even though
‘A prisoner does not release himself [from prison]’xxi
– which is refers to the Shekhinah, who is imprisoned in exile –
the Higher Shekhinah will redeem Her.

It is this that is written: {Ruth 3:13}If your redeemer shall redeem, then good,
and if he shall not desire to redeem you,
then Anokhi ∞‹∞‘I’› shall redeem you,
as Y”Y lives, lie down until the morning;
which is ‘the right hand extended to accept those who return’.
For this thing depends only upon repentancexxii
– the Higher right-hand of the Shekhinah.

Ruth 3:13

∞‘I’

At that time,
the Higher Shekhinah is: {Deut. 32:11}Like an eagle arousing ‘its nest’ ∞‹∞qino›
– which is Jerusalem – composed of qen∞‹∞nest› and the letter Vav,‹ו›
upon its young it will hover, it will spread its wings, it shall take it,
it shall carry it on its limb.
It is this that is written: {Ex. 19:4}And I carried you upon eagles’ wings,
and I brought you to Me.

Deut. 32:11

∞qino

∞nest ו

Ex. 19:4

For when the Shekhinah is in exile,
it is stated of Her: {Gen. 8:9}And the dove did not find rest . . . etc.
except on the Sabbath and Festivals.
And then, She is united with Her Master,
and many extra souls descend with Her to dwell in Israel.
It is this that is written:
{Ex. 31:16}And the Children of Israel shall observe the Sabbath,
for their generations . . .

Gen. 8:9

Ex. 31:16

Worthy is he, who prepares a dwelling place for Her in his heart,
and beautiful vessels with his limbs,
and ‘a beautiful woman,’ – which is his soul,
because it is for Her sake that Higher Shekhinah abides
– which is the soul of all life –
upon Her.281

And He, the blessed Holy One,
{Ex. 31:17} . . . He ‘ceased’ ∞‹∞shavat› – in one,
. . . and He ‘rested’ ∞‹∞naphash› – in one.
In relation to the Higher Shekhinah, it is He ceased upon them,
and in relation to the lower Shekhinah, it is He rested upon them
– and gave them extra souls,282
which are: {Ps. 45:15} . . . virgins following her, her companions,
which arrive with Her.
And many appointed angels and their servants,
arrive with them,
which are 70, which are suspended from:
{Ex. 20:8}Remember
and {Deut. 5:12}Observe.

Ex. 31:17

∞shavat

∞naphash

Ps. 45:15

Ex. 20:8

Deut. 5:12

And this is:
{Gen. 2:1}‘And they were completed’ ∞‹∞va-ye-khulu›‹72›,
comprising seventy and two,283
and these souls are called ‘guests’,284
because they dwell in Israel only on the Sabbath,
and when the Sabbath terminates, they all return to their places.

Gen. 2:1

∞va-ye-khulu 72

And the souls who are from the side of the Higher Shekhinah,
are called ‘chicks’,
and the souls from the side of the lower Shekhinah,
are called ‘eggs.’

And this is the mystery of:
‘Who spreads a tabernacle of peace over us.’xxiii 285
Higher Mother is the ‘tabernacle of peace’,
that spreads over them,
and ‘peace’ is with Her,
of which it is stated:{Num. 25:12} . . . behold I give to you my covenant of peace.

Num. 25:12

And there is a SuKkaH ∞‹∞tabernacle› below,
composed of K-O‹r26› and H-S‹65›,
which is Y-A-H-D-V-N-H-Y‹91›,
– a ‘tabernacle of’∞‹∞sukat› peace,
composed of kos∞‹∞cup› and the letter Tav‹ת›,
which is Tipheret.

At that time:
the ‘children’ will be in the domain of the blessed Holy One,
and a voice goes out and says:
do not take the mother upon the children.{Deut. 22:6}

23a

Deut. 22:6

Immediately,
upon the emergence of Remember and Observe of the Sabbath,
and the night of the first day of Sabbath arrives,
a second voice goes out: {Deut. 22:7}You shall surely send!

Deut. 22:7

And furthermore:
When a bird’s nest happens before you . . .
 – this is the Sukkah festival booth, which is Higher Mother,
. . . in any tree . . .
 – it is this that is written:

the fruit of a stately∞‹∞hadar› tree . . .

Lev. 23:40

∞hadar

. . . the chicks . . . – these are the seven days of Tabernacles
. . . or eggs . . . – in which are performed the 7 perambulations.286

And the mystery of the matter: {Jer. 31:21} . . . a woman shall encompass a man.
[and this is the mystery of:
{Is. 4:1}And seven women shall take hold of one man . . .

Jer. 31:21

Is. 4:1

Fruit of a stately tree . . . – lower Mother.
. . . tree . . . this is the lulav∞‹∞palm-frond›,
[lu‹r36› and lev∞‹∞ heart ›‹r32› pathways]
which is the etrog ∞‹∞citron›.
And one needs to shake it the lulav287 towards six sides:

to arouse over it Vav‹6›‹ו›,
and three shakings in every direction add up to ‘life’∞‹∞ ḥaiy ›‹r18›.

And four times 18 shakings are required:288
one with the taking of the lulav,
and one [Var. and two]289 at {Ps. 118:25}Please Y”Y . . .
two others at {Ps. 118:1}Give thanks to Y”Y

Ps. 118:25

Ps. 118:1

And with these shakings,
they bring low, from above to below,
the seventy-two nations.290

And after they are victorious over them, they say:
ANY VaHO Hoshi’ah na 291– twice,
which are the VAV from V-QO,
ANY V-QO, from:
{Ex. 14:19–21}And he the angel travelled . . .
And it the cloud came . . .
And he Moses stretched . . .

Ex. 14:19–21

And at that time:
{Deut. 22:6} . . . do not take the mother upon the children.
Eggs are from the aspect of the ophanim.
Chicks are from the aspect of the ‘youth’ – Metatro”n,292
children are from the aspect of the throne,
which is the ‘the tabernacle of peace’,
which is the nest of the Shekhinah,
for Higher Mother nests in the throne,
in the three higher sephirot.

Deut. 22:6

The Middle Pillar comprises six sephirot,
nesting in Metatro”n.
Lower Mother nests in the ‘wheel’∞‹∞ophan›,293
of which it is stated: {Ez. 1:15} . . . and behold one ophan∞‹∞wheel› on the earth . . .

∞ophan

Ez. 1:15

∞wheel

And furthermore:
the Shekhinah, from the aspect of the throne, is called ‘eagle’.
And from the aspect of ‘youth’ [Var. ḥayah∞‹∞’living-being’›], a ‘dove’,
and from the aspect of ophan, a ‘bird’,
and of the Shekhinah: {Ez. 1:5} . . . they had the image of a human.

∞’living-being’

Ez. 1:5

And furthermore: {Deut. 22:7}You shall surely send . . .
Come and see:
There is an angel appointed over birds
– which are souls that are called ‘birds’ –
and Sandalphon is its name.294
And when Israel fulfils this commandment of sending the nest,
and Mother goes wandering,
and the children cry out,
it the angel instructs merit over its birds,
and it says to the blessed Holy One:
‘Yet it is written of You: {Ps. 145:9} . . . and His mercy is upon all His works
 – so why have You decreed of this bird,
that it should be driven from its nest?’

Deut. 22:7

Ps. 145:9

And so does Metatron instruct merit for its ‘birds’,
which are the spirits that fly-forth into humans.
For such ‘souls’∞‹∞nishmatin› are from the throne,
and from this ḥayah are ‘spirits’∞‹∞ruḥin›,
and from ophan are ‘animating-souls’∞‹∞naphshin›,
and they are in:
‘Creation’∞‹∞briyah›,
‘Formation’∞‹∞ye-tzirah ›,
‘Making’ ∞‹∞’asiyah›.295

∞nishmatin

∞ruḥin

∞naphshin

∞briyah

∞ye-tzirah

∞’asiyah

On Sabbath and Festivals,
souls, spirits and animating-souls descend upon them,
by way of ‘emanation’∞‹∞atzilut›,
which are the spirit of holiness from the ten sephirot.
And each appointed angel instructs merit over its own ‘birds’,
which are the souls that fly-forth into humans.296
And when Israel fulfils this commandment of sending the nest,
each appointed-one instructs merit over its ‘birds’.

∞atzilut

And what does the blessed Holy One do?
He gathers all His forces, and says:
‘And is it [Var. thus] that every appointed-one over birds below,
instructs merit upon its birds that it is appointed over?
And yet no-one amongst you instructs merit,
upon My son who is Israel: {Ex. 4:22}My son, My firstborn Israel,
and upon the Shekhinah who is in exile,
whose nest – which is Jerusalem – is destroyed.’

Ex. 4:22

And His children in exile,
are under the hand of harsh masters – the nations of the world,
and there is no-one who requests mercy for them,
and instructs merit upon them.

At that time, the blessed Holy One ‘cries out’,
and He says: {Is. 48:11}For My sake, for My sake, I shall act . . .
{Ez. 20:14} . . . and I shall act for the sake of My Name . . .
and through this, mercy is aroused upon His Shekhinah,
and upon His children in exile.

Is. 48:11

Ez. 20:14

Rabbi Elazar arose and said:
‘But before Israel and the Shekhinah were exiled,
why would they have fulfilled ‘the sending of the nest’?’297

Rabbi Shim’on said to him:
‘My son, so as to arouse mercy,
over those souls, and spirits and animating-souls,
which went into exile in reincarnation,298
driven from their bodies which were destroyed,
about whom it is stated,
that ‘the blessed Holy One builds worlds and destroys∞‹∞ma-ḥariv› them’,xxiv
for their bodies remained destroyed for them.

∞ma-ḥariv

And the prevention of blessings above causes:
{Job 14:11} . . . and the river becomes parched ∞‹∞ye-ḥerav› and dry.
And thus they the sages have determined:xxv
‘The First Temple was destroyed –
is alluded to by {Gen. 1:2}And the earth was formless and void . . .

Job 14:11

∞ye-ḥerav

Gen. 1:2

The Second Temple was destroyed –
is alluded to by{Gen. 1:2} . . . and darkness upon the face of the deep . . . ’

23b

Gen. 1:2

And for the sake of those souls,
who were created before the world was created,299
and they have no bodies therefore,
in order to arouse mercy over them,
they Israel would fulfil this precept of sending the nest.

He said to him: ‘But Father,
if so, then in the case of a scholar,
who is from the aspect of that thought,
of which it is stated:xxvi ‘Israel arose in thought to be created’,300
then the Torah is like a son to the scholar,301
and thus, why would his wife require levirate marriage,
for the sages of the Mishnah made no distinction,
between a scholar and other men on this matter?’302

He said to him: ‘My son,
[She] definitely requires levirate marriage,
for the sake of those souls that have been ‘going naked’,303
since the six days of creation.’

He said to him:
‘But it is written: {Lev. 27:10} . . . he shall not swap it or exchange it . . . etc.
And so, how can this wife, who is ‘holy of holies’,
be a nest [Var. perch304] for one who is not of her ‘type’?
For it is written: {Gen. 1:24}‘Let the earth bring forth each living soul,
of its type . . . ’
And she should only be ‘grafted’ with her ‘type’.

Lev. 27:10

Gen. 1:24

He said to him: ‘My son,
reincarnations are of the mystery of ‘grafting’.
Like one who grafts a tree with another tree that is not of its type,
like those who graft trees one to another.
But the principle of {Lev. 27:33} . . . and if he shall exchange it at all . . .
is that it needs to be ‘holy’ for ‘holy’.

Lev. 27:33

For there is a tree which is from the aspect of impurity,
which is evil, and because of that it is stated:
{Lev. 33:10}He shall not exchange it, good for bad or bad for good . . .
For this is the mystery,
of:xxvii ‘the righteous one for whom it is evil,
and the wicked one for whom it is good.’

Lev. 33:10

But if he shall surely exchange it,
then it and its exchange are sacred.

And thus, do we graft sacred onto sacred,
and one receives from the other.
And the mystery of the matter is: {Ex. 26:5} . . . the loops corresponding . . .
and ‘each with its own type’ – that is:
‘the righteous one for whom it is good.’

Ex. 26:5

And when that soul which is holy,
does not find its ‘type’,
it is stated of it: {Gen. 8:9}And the dove did not find a resting place,
for the sole of her foot . . .

Gen. 8:9

And so is the mystery of the bird’s nest,
of which it is stated: {Deut. 22:7}You shall surely send away the mother . . .
and She goes wandering from her nest,
{Job 33:29}And behold, all of these does EL do,
twice or three times with a man . . .
 – corresponding to the three ‘missions’305 of the dove.
And, when it finds a place in which to abide,
it is stated of it: {Gen. 8:12}And she did not continue to return to him anymore,
[what is anymore?] – to come yet another time,
in ‘grafting’ [reincarnation].

Deut. 22:7

Job 33:29

Gen. 8:12

And therefore, the ‘sending of the nest’
is only with holy birds [and not impure ones],xxviii
who are souls that have gone wandering,
to arouse mercy over them.

And that which is written of them: {Ps. 84:4}Even a bird has found a home . . .
 – this is the first reincarnation which is ‘animating-soul’ ∞‹∞nephesh›,
. . . and the freedom of the nest is hers . . .
 – this is the second reincarnation – of ‘spirit’∞‹∞ruḥa›,
. . . where she has placed her chicks . . .
 – this is the third reincarnation – of soul∞‹∞nishmata›.
[in its reincarnation: . . . Your altars, Y”Y TZVA-OT].

Ps. 84:4

∞nephesh

∞ruḥa

∞nishmata

And therefore, this You shall ‘surely’ send ∞‹∞shalei-aḥ te-shalaḥ›,306
corresponds to ‘animating-soul’ and ‘spirit’.
. . . the mother ∞‹∞et ha-eim› . . . is to include the level of ‘soul’,
of whom it is stated:{Is. 50:1}
And through your sins your mother was sent away . . .
. . . et ha-eim∞‹∞the mother› – et 307 comes to include the third reincarnation.

∞shalei-aḥ te-shalaḥ

∞et ha-eim

Is. 50:1

∞the mother

And therefore,
whoever receives308 ‘the visitors’,
who are the extra souls,
which are grafted onto them on the Sabbath eve,
with bright faces, [with radiant bodies],
with joy, with delight in this world,
then when the soul, and the spirit, and the animating-soul,
exit from his body, from this world,
that is how They receive them in the world to come,
and it is stated of them:{Ps. 84:4} Even the bird has found a home . . . etc.

Ps. 84:4

Worthy is he who welcomes visitors with perfect will,
as though he is receiving the face of the Shekhinah,309
‘for by the measure with which a person measures,
so do they measure esteem him.’ xxix

Rabbi El’azar his son came and kissed his hands,
and all the companions prostrated before him and said to him:
‘If we had not come to the world except to hear these words,
it would have been enough.’

Meanwhile,
Behold Elijah the prophet had descended from above,
with many hosts of souls, and many angels around him,
and with the Higher Shekhinah as a diadem upon all of them,
‘a crown upon the head of every righteous one’.xxx

At that moment,
a voice was aroused in song in the Tree Above,
where many ‘birds’ of souls reside in its branches,
it is this that is written: {Dan. 4:8}The tree grew and became strong . . .
 – and thus did it the voice say:

Dan. 4:8

‘Rabbi! Rabbi!
You are the tree that grows and becomes mighty in Torah!
In your branches, which are holy limbs,
many ‘birds’ dwell there, of holy souls!
Like ‘above’, of which it is stated:
{Dan. 4:9} . . . and in its branches dwelt the birds of the heavens . . . ’

Dan. 4:9

And many people below,
shall be sustained from this

composition of yours,310
when it shall be revealed below,
in the final generation, at the end of days.311
And due to it: {Lev. 25:10}and you shall proclaim freedom∞‹∞dror› in the land etc.

∞dror

Opened Elijah, and he said:
‘When Sabbath and festivals terminate,
and Israel are under the governance of Samael,
and the ‘appointed seventy’,
and they are oppressing Israel,

∞In the beginning

Tiqun Seven,312 For Day 5

Be-REiShYT∞‹∞In the beginning›
the same letters as YRE∞‹∞fear› BoSheT∞‹∞shame›.313

∞In the beginning

∞fear ∞shame

Woe unto Samael,
when the blessed Holy One comes to redeem the Shekhinah,
and Israel Her children!
And He shall make claim of him,
and from the seventy nations and their appointed ones,
over all the persecutions,
by which they troubled314 Israel in exile.

Because before Israel were exiled,
the blessed Holy One revealed315 to him Samael,
that Israel will be destined to be under their captive control,
[Var. to go out from under their subservience]
and He showed him,
and the seventy appointed ones under his hand,
their reward – if they will respect Israel in exile.
It is this that is written: {Gen. 39:5}And Y”Y blessed the House of the Egyptian,
because of Joseph.

Gen. 39:5

But he and his appointed ones,
did not behave respectfully towards them,
instead, they degraded them and the Shekhinah,
for they say to them every day: {Ps. 42:4} . . . where is your God?316

Ps. 42:4

And therefore, a voice goes out to him,
every day from the heavens and says:
Fear∞‹∞YeRE› Shame∞‹∞BoSheT›!
– may you have shame from the Shekhinah
– ‘fear of the heavens’,
– may you have shame from the blessed Holy One
– Who is ‘the heavens’.xxxi
It is this that is written: {1 King. 8:32} . . . and You shall hear O heavens . . .

∞YeRE ∞BoSheT

1 King. 8:32

And this is: [Be-REiShYT]

Tiqun Eight317

Be-REiShYT
– the letter Shyn‹ש› alludes to the word shamayim∞‹∞heavens›,
[fear∞‹∞YeRE› of the heavens∞‹∞ShaMaYiM›]
– fear the ‘house’ – His house,
for He is ‘ROSh∞‹∞Head› of BaYiT∞‹∞House›’ letters of Be-REiShYT,
Fear Him in His house [this is Be-REiShYT].

ש ∞heavens

∞YeRE ∞ShaMaYiM

∞Head ∞House

But he Samael and his appointed ones did not fear Him,
and they destroyed His house,
– the First Temple, and the Second Temple.

And therefore: {Is. 24:23} . . . and the moon will be humiliated . . .
 – for it is the snake, the whoring wife,
. . . and the sun was ashamed . . . – which is hell.
For the snake,318 the whoring wife,
destroyed the house of the Shekhinah,
and the sun – which is hell,319 the poison of death
– it burnt the sanctuary.

Is. 24:23

And when the blessed Holy One shall build them as before
– it is this that is written: {Ps. 147:2}The builder of Jerusalem is Y”Y . . .
 – at that time:
and the moon shall be humiliated, and the sun ashamed . . .
When?
At the time {Is. 24:23} . . . when Y”Y of Hosts will have reigned . . .

Ps. 147:2

Is. 24:23

For the first building Temples,
was made [Var. were built] by human hands,320
and thus, they conquered them,
because {Ps. 127:1}If Y”Y shall not build the house,
then its builders have toiled in vain . . .

Ps. 127:1

shall be by the ‘hand’ of the blessed Holy One,
it will endure.321

of the latter than the former . . . 322

Hag. 2:9

when the Temple building shall be built
by the ‘hand’ of the blessed Holy One,
above and below,
then it is stated of the Shekhinah,

And the light of the moon shall be as the light of the sun . . .

Is. 24:23

{Is. 24:23}And the moon shall be ashamed, and the sun shall be humiliated
 – which are the female partners of Samael.
And because Samael did not fear the blessed Holy One,323
– Who is called ‘the heavens’ –
and his partner did not fear His Shekhinah,
– Who is His ‘earth’ –
it is stated of them: {Is. 51:6} . . . for the heavens like smoke shall dissipate,
and the earth like a garment shall be worn out . . .
 – this refers to Samael and his partner.

Is. 51:6

Be-REiShYT ∞‹∞In the beginning› is composed of the letters
YeRE∞‹∞Fear› ShaBaT ∞‹∞Sabbath›
which is the Shekhinah, about Whom it is stated:

For the enemies have entered into her ‘space’ ∞‹∞ḥalal›,
which is the Holy of Holies,
and it is stated of them: {Num. 19:20} . . . he has defiled the sanctuary of Y”Y,
{Lam. 2:2}He has profaned ∞‹∞ḥilel› the kingdom and its princes,
and the maidservant has entered the place of the mistress,
for she is ‘menstruant, maidservant, heathen, whore’,325
and she has polluted Her place,
there that was the resting place of the Shekhinah.
And a voice descended and said:
Fear ∞‹∞YeRE› Sabbath∞‹∞ShaBaT ›.
And she did not do so,
but profaned the kingdom and its princes,
and the Shekhinah fled from there.

Gen. 16:8

The blessed Holy One then said:
‘Daughter of the wicked guilty one!
And yet even though Sarai expelled her,
I was merciful upon her and upon her son,
but you did not do so,
rather, you caused [Var. bestowed] evil instead of good.
I promise to remove the wicked kingdom from the world,
and there shall be no joy before Me,
until they are vanquished from the world
– and at that time, there shall there be joy before Me.’
Thus is written: {Prov. 11:10}And in the perishing of the wicked there is joy.

Be-REiShYT is composed of the letters

and this is the most praiseworthy song of all songs,

from the world.

[For then:{Is. 11:9} . . . and the earth shall be full of knowledge of H’ etc.]

∞then

1 King. 5:10

Is. 11:9

And who raises Her to Her place?
It is Moses.
And the mystery of the matter: ‘then’∞‹∞az› shall Moses sing . . .
With what does he raise her?
With the cantillation note ֠ ‹te-lisha›.’330
This ‘crownlet’331 of the te-lisha332 is the Yod‹י› of YaShYR∞‹∞he will sing›.333

∞az

te-lisha

י ∞he will sing

And She shall rise-up from the Hei‹ה› of MoSheH∞‹∞Moses›,
[Var. She is י‹Yod› and Shir; וו‹Vav-Vav› will rise from הה‹Hei-Hei› of Mosheh]
and reside upon the head of the letter ו‹Vav›,
to become the crownlet of the letter ז‹Zayin›,
and then he raises Her to the place from where She was hewn.

ה ∞Moses

Yod Vav-Vav Hei-Hei

Vav

Zayin

When She ascends towards Higher Yod,
She is called ‘ShYR’∞‹∞song› – of the male,
but when She descends towards Hei‹Hei›,
She is called ‘ShYRaH’ which is female.
It is thus written: Then shall Moses and the Children of Israel sing,
this song ∞‹∞shirah› to H’ . . . etc.
About which it is stated: {Ps. 118:22}The stone which the builders rejected . . . etc.

∞song

ה

∞shirah

Ps. 118:22

For She is the stone that smashes the icon334 of idol worship.

At that time:
when the icon of idol worship – the evil image – is smashed,
it is stated of it:{Dan. 2:35} . . . and the stone which smashed the idol
became a huge mountain and filled the earth.
It is this that is written:{Is. 6:3} . . . the earth is full of His glory.

Dan. 2:35

Is. 6:3

And thus, She ascends,
until Her place is not cannot be found,
and the angels enquire about Her:
‘Where is the place of His glory to praise Him?’xxxiv
And no measure is found for Her,
to the point where they say: {Ez. 3:12}
Blessed is the glory of Y”Y from His place.
Because She has ascended to ‘the Infinite’,335
which is י‹Yod› – the head of א‹Aleph›.

Ez. 3:12

Yod Aleph

And where how does She ascend?
Through ‘the Middle Pillar’‹Tipheret› which is ו‹Vav›,
– the crown upon its head.336
When She ascends to be the crown upon its head,
it is stated of Her: {Prov. 12:4}A woman of valour is the crown of her husband . . .
And when She descends to be below Him,
She is called His coupling and intimate partner.

Tipheret Vav

When She is a ḥayah339 between them, they angels say:xxxvi

When She ascends from them, they ask:

all the ḥayot ∞‹∞angelic ‘beings’› {Ez. 1:24} . . . let down their wings.

∞angelic ‘beasts’

Ez. 1:24

And when does She ascend above?
When Israel stands in the ‘standing’ prayer.340
{ibid}It is this that is written: When they stand, they let down their wings.
For She ascends to the Infinite,
to request sustenance from the Cause of all causes.
And when She descends,
She descends full of all good things.341

∞ḥayot

which is in the middle of the letter א‹ Aleph› [Var. Middle Pillar],
to which they call ‘Hear YiSRaEL∞‹∞Israel›’!
composed of the letters ShYR EL∞‹∞Song of God›.

∞Israel

∞Song of God

And at that time, when She descends,
what is written of the ḥayot?

Ez 1:24

Arose Elijah and said:
‘Rabbi! Rabbi! Go back over what you said!
Certainly,342 when She ascends,
all the ḥayot are chirping towards Her,
with many songs and praises.
And She ascends above all of them to the Infinite,
it is this that is written: {Prov. 31:29}Many daughters have done valiantly,
but you have risen above them all.

Prov. 31:29

Until Israel calls to Her below through the recital of the Shm‘a,
that She should descend towards them.
And through Whom do they call to Her?
Through Her coupling partner,
who is Vav‹ו› – ‘Israel the Elder’.343
And He is ShYR∞‹∞Song of› EL∞‹∞God›344 anagram of Yisrael,

In the mystery of the cantillation notes,
She is called ‘a movement’,347
from the aspect of a vowel-point, She is ‘unity’.
And one needs to lengthen Her,

and one needs to lower Her,
to influence with the vowel-point ḥireq‹ ִ › endlessly,
to cause Her to reign over those below.

When They are in singular unity,

And thus are Israel required,
to couple with their partners in silence,
with humility, with fear, with trembling and with sweat,
with shame.
As the earlier sages have established:xxxviii

– which is the SheD from ShaDaY∞‹∞Almighty›,

And if he lets his voice be heard,354
then immediately: {Gen. 4:7} . . . sin crouches at the entrance . . .

And not for nought did the earlier sages establish:
‘those who raise their voice in prayer are of little faith’.xxxix

Gen. 4:7

At that time:
when the blessed Holy One unites with His Shekhinah,
all the ḥayot receive blessings one from the other,
and all are in holiness∞‹∞qedushah›.

∞qedushah

And thus, they the sages enacted
rites of ‘consecration’ ∞‹∞qiddushin› and blessings for a bride,
corresponding to the blessing, and the holiness, and the unity,
of the blessed Holy One.

∞qiddushin

So it is required of Israel,
that their acts of unity be in holiness and in blessing.
And thus will all their sustenance be in blessing and holiness,
and there is no holiness within less than ten,xl
which is the letter Yod‹י›‹10›.

י 10

And because the ring is a י‹Yod›356 which appears like this: ם‹Mem›,
a bride is consecrated with it,
and it is required to be placed upon her finger,
which is an image of the letter ו‹Vav›,
and it is made into a ז‹Zayin›.
And two witnesses are required who correspond to ה-ה‹Hei Hei›.357
And when the ring is on the top of the finger,
and it is made into a ‹Zayin›‹7›,

with the seven blessings which a bride inherits.

91

ו‹Vav› – this is Torah,
which resides in the mouth,
and with the spirit of the mouth it flies above the ‘eagle’.
For the ‘eagle’ is the nose,363
its two wings are the two lips,
and upon it is stated:
{Ecc. 10:20} . . . For the bird of the heavens will carry the voice,
and the one who has wings will tell a thing . . .
 – and this is ‘the Middle Pillar’‹Tipheret›.

Vav

Ecc. 10:20

Tipheret

For Ḥokhmah and Binah are ‘hidden’,364
in the brain and the heart,
in love and fear.

But the Torah, without fear and love,
does not fly upwards.365 [Var. and with this eagle]

And upon Keter depends ‘children, life and sustenance’,
for it is the mazal 366 of all,
and itself is not dependent upon any mazal.
And therefore, they established:xlv
‘children, life and sustenance do not depend upon merit,
but they do depend upon mazal ’
– for Ḥesed∞‹∞benevolence› is merit.

∞benevolence

The ‘lesser Hei’367 is: {Ez. 1:5}the human image
 – with it YQV”Q is perfected,
and She [Hei‹ה›] is the holy Malkhut
– She is mitzvah∞‹∞precept› – the performance of commandments –
for She resides in ‘the 248 limbs’.368

ה

∞precept

And regarding Torah and precept,
it is stated of them: {Deut. 29:28} . . . and the revealed things are for us . . .
And Torah and precept without fear and love,
cannot ascend to stand before Y-Q.

Deut. 29:28

She‹Malkhut› is comprised of everything,
and above all is ADaM∞‹∞human›‹45›,
– YOD QE VAV QE‹45›
– this is ‘thought’369
– for everything ascends to the Infinite,
but through Malkhut everything is completed,
above and below.

Malkhut

∞human 45

45

And it is comprised of ‘the four370 sections’,
of the recital of the Shm’a,
which are 248 words,
together with the words ‘God the faithful King . . . ’
And so that no interruption is made ,
they instituted that the prayer leader would repeat:371
the final words “Y”Y your God, is truth”.

And when Israel say the Shm’a,
then surely [Var. the Masters of] the ḥayot lower their wings.
In which place?
In the ‘wings’ of precept,372 of which it is stated:
{Deut. 22:12} . . . upon the four corners of your garment,
with which you cover yourself,
– which is like the coat of the ephod priestly garment,
upon which are bells and pomegranates,
corresponding to the knots and ties of tzitzit,
while the edges of the coat correspond to ‘the wings of mitzvah∞‹∞precept›’.

Deut. 22:12

∞precept

And these five knots,373
correspond to “Hear∞‹∞Shm’a› O Israel Y”Y ELQYNU Y”Y”,
which correspond to the five strings of David’s harp,374
which played by itself,xlvi
13 ‘ties’375 – as the numerical value of the word ‘one’ ∞‹∞eḥad›‹r13›
– for the voice of song raises at the word eḥad ∞‹∞one›

∞Shm’a

∞eḥad r13

∞one

And this is 18, between ties and knots, on each side,
which add up to 72.
And this is: {Is. 16:5}And the throne is established with kindness∞‹∞ḥesed›.
Ḥesed is 72 in gematria.
Anyone who wraps himself in the ‘wrapping’376 of precept,
is as if he has prepared377 a throne for the blessed Holy One
– and they are Y-A-Q-D-V-N-Q-Y.

Is. 16:5

∞ḥesed

– adding up to 64,
and with the eight letters of Y-A-Q-D-V-N-Q-Y,
they add up to 72.

And the ‘wings of precept’ tzitzit fringes

– for there are eight strings on each side,
corresponding to the four faces and four wings of each ḥayah,
and in the ‘small counting’ of the name of Enoch,378

∞az

And they are 7,
corresponding to the seven days of Creation,
which allude to ‘the seven Names of A-V-G-Y-T-Tz’ etc.
And upon them it is stated: {Is. 6:2}Seraphs standing above it,

through which prayer flies upwards.

Is. 6:2

corresponding to the 42 mentions of HVYH
which are in the phylacteries of the hand,
and the phylacteries of the head.
And upon them it is stated:xlviii

Deut. 28:10

And they are ‘the adornments of the bride’.
The ‘phylacteries∞‹∞tephilin› of the head’ –
is a crown of gold on the head of the bride,
and the ‘phylacteries of the hand’ is a ring bracelet of the arm.
Behold thus is the bride made ready379 with her adornments,
one needs to call to Her Groom.
It is this that is written: {Deut. 6:4}Hear O Israel . . .

∞tephilin

Deut. 6:4

And then, behold, they are in the wedding canopy.
The Holy People must then rise in ‘standing’∞‹∞’amidah› before them,380
with the cantor, to bless them with 7 blessings,
and for the groom to consecrate the bride,
firstly, with the rite of ‘consecration’.

the holy ḥayot that were making music with their wings,
